panels.description: Rate of cache hits to misses.
panels.title: Cache hit rate

panels.description: The rate of requests sent to the Varnish Cache frontend.
panels.title: Frontend requests

panels.description: The rate of requests sent to the Varnish Cache backends.
panels.title: Backend requests

panels.description: The rate of total sessions created in the Varnish Cache instance.
panels.title: Sessions rate

panels.description: Rate of cache hits for pass objects (fulfilled requests that are not cached).
panels.title: Cache hit pass

panels.description: Length of session queue waiting for threads.
panels.title: Session queue length

panels.description: Rate of recycled, reused, busy, unhealthy, and accepted backend connections by Varnish Cache.
panels.title: Backend connections

panels.description: Rate of new connected, queued, and dropped sessions.
panels.title: Sessions

panels.description: Rate of frontend and backend requests received.
panels.title: Requests

panels.description: Ratio of cache hits to cache misses.

targets.expr: avg by (instance, job) ((rate(varnish_main_cache_hit{job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval]) / clamp_min(rate(varnish_main_cache_hit{job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval]) + rate(varnish_main_cache_miss{job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval]), 1))) * 100

panels.title: Cache hit ratio

panels.description: Bytes allocated from Varnish Cache storage.
panels.title: Memory used

panels.description: Rate of expired and LRU (least recently used) nuked objects.
panels.title: Cache events

panels.description: Rate for the response bytes of header and body for frontend and backends.
panels.title: Network

panels.description: Number of failed, created, limited, and current threads.
panels.title: Threads
